issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

issues.description:
A possible integer underflow exists in the function `burnFrom(address,uint256)`.
The subtraction may result in a value < 0.
issues.title: Integer Underflow

issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `sell(uint256)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function sell(uint256). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
issues.title: Transaction order dependence
